Author: eatsomethingxo
Text: I'll give that a try and use something to make sure its weighing that right. Then I'll just only use my scale so it doesn't stress me as much

Author: usr687
Text: Iâ€™ve been having this problem with my digital scale vs the scale at the doctor vs the scale at the gym. I finally bought a 5lb kettle ball and make sure my scale reads 5lbs before I use it, and then weigh myself with and without it and make sure it all works correctly
